name: Weather Forecast
description: Users asking for near-term weather forecasts, typically limited to the next five days, often scoped to their local area. Routes to weather API or meteorological data service.

name: Crop Cultivation Guidance
primary_intent: How to cultivate a specific crop
description: Queries focus on cultivation practices such as sowing methods, preparation steps, and best practices for crops. Expect agronomic guidance rather than numeric data.

name: Input Cost and Fertilizer Queries
description: Mixes fertilizer recommendations with price-related mentions. The overlap is driven by short queries that combine cost and usage.

name: Pest and Disease Control
description: Users ask about pests, diseases, and spraying solutions for crops including pulses and flowers. Aligns with pesticide recommendations and integrated pest management.

name: General Market Price
description: Queries seek typical or average prices rather than real-time or location-specific values. Suitable for historical averages or explanatory responses.

name: Location-specific Queries
description: Questions scoped to specific districts or sub-districts, often combining location with prices or cultivation queries. Location extraction is critical.

name: Livestock Disease Mastitis
description: Focused on mastitis in cattle and buffaloes. Should route to veterinary health guidance and treatment protocols.

name: Timing and Scheduling
primary_intent: When to perform an agricultural activity
description: Users asking about the correct timing for activities such as planting, spraying, or other farm operations. Temporal rather than procedural.

name: Sunlight and Shade Requirements
primary_intent: Light requirements of plants and flowers
description: Queries about whether plants require shade or sunlight, especially for ornamental flowers. Suitable for horticulture knowledge bases.

name: Irrigation and Water Management
primary_intent: When and how much water to give
description: Strong irrigation-focused intent covering frequency, quantity, and irrigation methods such as drip systems.

name: Price Trend and Future Expectation
description: Users asking whether prices will rise or fall and when. Predictive/speculative and distinct from current price lookups.

name: Dairy and Livestock Productivity
description: Questions focus on increasing milk yield, feed, and general dairy management. Suitable for livestock productivity advice.

name: Romanized Queries
primary_intent: Market price queries in Romanized script
description: Mirrors market-price intents but written in Romanized script. Normalization or transliteration can merge with standard price clusters.

name: Crop-specific Market Price
description: Clear intent for checking prices of specific crops in agricultural markets. Ideal for live mandi/market integrations.

name: Application and Documentation
primary_intent: How to apply and required documents
description: Users seek information on application processes, document requirements, and application status for government schemes.

name: Agricultural Subsidies General
description: Queries about subsidies for farming, machinery, and soil/health schemes. Often overlaps with government programs.

name: Weed Control Methods
description: Focused on identifying and comparing weed control methods. Suitable for agronomy best-practice content.

name: Location-specific Spraying Advice
primary_intent: Spray recommendations by region and crop
description: Combines spraying advice with crop and location context, implying localized recommendations.

name: Conversational Acknowledgements
description: Not a knowledge intent. Consists of acknowledgements and location mentions. Should be handled by a fallback conversational handler.

name: Care and Preventive Measures
primary_intent: How to take care and precautions
description: Users ask about preventive care, especially for newborn animals or crops. Often overlaps with health and safety guidance.

name: Todays Market Price
description: Focused on today's prices, often with city or district context. Distinct from average or future price intents.

name: Ideal Irrigation Schedules
description: More structured than general irrigation queries, these ask for ideal or recommended irrigation schedules, sometimes crop-specific.

name: Weather Conditions and Seasonal Effects
description: Broader weather-related questions focusing on conditions and their impact rather than short-term forecasts.

name: Fertilizer Application Methods
description: Users asking about fertilizer application techniques, equipment, and methods.

name: Machinery Subsidies and Schemes
description: A more specific subsidy cluster focusing on machinery and government programs. Sub-intent of general subsidies.

name: Low-signal Fragmented Queries
description: Low semantic density cluster. Queries lack sufficient intent and should be handled via clarification prompts.

name: Agro-chemicals and Pesticides
description: Strong intent for chemical usage, including pesticides, fungicides, and herbicides.

name: Seeds and Input Sourcing
primary_intent: Where to buy seeds and inputs
description: Queries about availability and sourcing of seeds and related inputs, sometimes mixed with price mentions.
